mapper.insert: insert into pisp_driver_run_city( RUN_CITY_ID, USER_ID, CITY_CODE, TO_PROVINCE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, AREA_CODE) values(#{runCityId}, #{userId}, #{cityCode}, #{toProvinceCode}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{areaCode})
mapper.select: SELECT pdrc.CITY_CODE, pdrc.CREATE_TIME, pdrc.CREATE_USER, pdrc.RUN_CITY_ID, pdrc.TO_PROVINCE_CODE, pdrc.USER_ID, pdrc.AREA_CODE, tpt.DIST_NAME AS areaCodeName, rci.DIST_NAME AS runCity, tpc.DIST_NAME AS runCityParentName FROM pisp_driver_run_city pdrc LEFT JOIN pisp_district rci ON rci.DIST_CODE = pdrc.CITY_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_district tpc ON tpc.DIST_CODE = pdrc.TO_PROVINCE_CODE LEFT JOIN pisp_district tpt ON tpt.DIST_CODE = pdrc.AREA_CODE WHERE pdrc.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY pdrc.CREATE_TIME asc
SELECT group_concat(run.RUN_CITYS)AS runCity FROM (select IFNULL(CITY_CODE,TO_PROVINCE_CODE) AS RUN_CITYS from pisp_driver_run_city where USER_ID=#{userId}) AS run
SELECT group_concat(IFNULL(TO_PROVINCE_CODE,''), '',IFNULL(CITY_CODE, ''), '',IFNULL(AREA_CODE, ''),'') AS runCity FROM pisp_driver_run_city WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
